features.title: Edge & Cloud
features.description: Parallel connects edge hardware with cloud intelligence to create a seamless parking network. ALPR, AI, and built-in security power every system, reducing overhead while ensuring 100% uptime. With effortless setup and future-proof reliability, operators get technology that simply works.

features.title: Live Data
features.description: Parallel turns parking activity into actionable insights in real time. Operators get a live revenue dashboard and a full analytics suite with downloadable reports and summaries—clear data that drives smarter decisions.

features.title: Operator Settings
features.description: Our Operator Portal puts advanced control in one place. From permit management and validation to real-time notifications, every feature is designed for simplicity and precision. Operators can fine-tune settings instantly, keeping parking efficient and easy to manage at scale.

features.title: User App
features.description: Designed entirely around the driver, the Parallel app makes parking simple from the first tap. Live availability and real-time insights keep users informed, while true drive-in, drive-out access removes tickets and guesswork. In just minutes, anyone can get set up and experience a frictionless way to park, every time.

features.title: Payments
features.description: Parallel makes paying for parking seamless. Drivers can start sessions instantly with a Lot ID or QR code, while operators receive secure, automated payments without added complexity.

features.title: Auto Violations
features.description: Parallel automates enforcement with a complete violation system. Tickets can be created, printed, and managed directly in the portal, with a built-in dispute process for fairness. Operators can segment violators and focus effort where it matters most—targeting the top 20% who cause the majority of issues.
